articles.title: The Earnings Picture Continues to Improve
articles.content: Given the emerging consensus on the 'soft-landing' outlook, one can expect this favorable turn in the overall earnings picture to strengthen further as companies report Q3 results and share trends in underlying business.

articles.title: Google's stock sheds market cap the size of Nike in one of Wall Street's five worst drops ever
articles.content: The selloff in Alphabet shares Wednesday resulted in the fifth-largest one-day decline in market value for any U.S. company on record.

articles.title: Why Broadcom, Qualcomm, and Advanced Micro Devices Plunged Today
articles.content: It was a bad day for semiconductors as Texas Instruments' guidance came in light, and analysts noted weak demand for the new iPhone.

articles.title: Morgan Stanley Says  'Spotify The Business' Has Joined 'Spotify The Product' In Delivering For Shareholders
articles.content:
Morgan Stanley analyst reiterated an Overweight rating on the shares of Spotify Technology SA (NYSE: SPOT) and raised the price target from $190 to $200.
The analyst said 2023 highlighted the case for Spotify and has answered questions about its strength amongst tough competitors like Apple Inc (NASDAQ: AAPL), Amazon.com Inc (NASDAQ: AMZN) etc and the unit economics of the business.
Spotify reported third-quarter FY23 revenue growth of 11% year-on-year to €3.36 billion ($3.65 billion), and EPS of €0.33 or $0.36, both above the street view.
According to the analyst, advertising revenue growth, marketplace ...Full story available on Benzinga.com

articles.title: Apple is raising the price of its Apple TV+ streaming service by over 40%
articles.content: Apple is increasing the price of its TV streaming plan to $9.99, joining other streaming brands like Netflix and Disney that have upped prices this year.
